text: The Lancia Musa is a Compact MPV made by Lancia from 2004 to 2012. The car shares its platform with the Fiat Idea. == History == The Lancia Musa was first shown at the Geneva Motor Show in 2004. Sales started in Europe in October of the same year. The Musa has a similar design to the Lancia Ypsilon. It also uses the same headlights. â€“ accessed via the Wayback Machine The Musa is part of the B-segment in the European car market. It came with 1.4 FIRE petrol engines and 1.3 or 1.9 diesel engines. In 2007, the car was updated with a facelift. ==Markets== The Lancia Musa was mainly sold in European Market in all its production however it was not sold outside Europe. ==Discontinuation== The Lancia Musa was discontinued in 2012, without a successor. ==References== Category:Lancia automobiles
title: Lancia Musa
